workouts.title: High Intensity Interval Training
workouts.description: a blitz of fat burning workouts

exercises.title: burpies
exercises.description: The burpee is a full body exercise used in strength training and as an aerobic exercise. The basic movement is performed in four steps and known as a 'four-count burpee'.

exercises.title: mountain climbers
exercises.description: Mountain climbers exercise variations that'll work your abs hard.

exercises.title: lunges
exercises.description: The exercise does triple duty by extensively working the quadriceps, the glutes and the hamstrings

exercises.title: overhead press
exercises.description: typically performed while standing, in which a weight is pressed straight upwards from the shoulders until the arms are locked out overhead.

exercises.title: biceps curl
exercises.description: Although the exercises differ, a common factor of each is a 'curling' motion, where a weight (attached to, or used in conjunction with, an item of equipment listed above) is moved through an arc, primarily using the strength

exercises.title: chest fly/flye
exercises.description: A fly or flye is a strength training exercise in which the hand and arm move through an arc while the elbow is kept at a constant angle.

workouts.title: core workout
workouts.description: a variety of exercises to strengthen your core

exercises.title: crunches
exercises.description: The basic crunch is the consummate abdominal exercise in a strength-training program.

exercises.title: planking
exercises.description: The plank (also called a front hold, hover, or abdominal bridge) is an isometric core strength exercise that involves maintaining a difficult position for extended periods of time.

exercises.title: side crunches
exercises.description: This is a core exercise that uses the rack to isolate the obliques and build strength and definition using your own body weight in a side crunch.

exercises.title: clean and jerk
exercises.description: a two-movement weightlifting exercise in which a weight is raised above the head following an initial lift to shoulder level.

exercises.title: romanian deadlift
exercises.description: The deadlift is a weight training exercise in which a loaded barbell is lifted off the ground to the hips, then lowered back to the ground.

exercises.title: overhead squat
exercises.description: the barbell is held overhead in a wide-arm snatch grip; however, it is also possible to use a closer grip if balance allows.
